heading.title: News
heading.description: At INSEMASA, we believe in a future where agriculture not only nourishes, but also protects our planet.

footer-top.title: INSEMASA
footer-top.description: We specialize in the supply and export of exceptional quality sesame and peanut seeds from small farms and cooperatives in Nicaragua.
footer-top.desc2: two blocks south, three blocks down
footer-top.desc3: Left hand stop house number A-II - 44

author.phrase: “Agriculture is the profession of the wise, the most suitable for the simple, and the most worthy occupation for any free man.” - Marcus Tullius Cicero

article.title: A new company in the export of Nicaraguan sesame.
article.p1: INSEMASA, a new company in the export of Nicaraguan sesame, has started a collaboration with small sesame farmers, committed to family agriculture, to purchase sesame at fair prices. This initiative seeks to support local farmers, who often face challenges in obtaining a fair income for their work.
article.blockquote: Nicaragua, with its fertile soil and tropical climate, has found in peanuts and sesame two crops of great importance to its economy.
article.p2: Sesame has experienced significant growth in exports over the past few years. Its international demand, driven by its use in the cosmetics and food industries, has benefited Nicaraguan producers.
article.title2: We ensure the acquisition of high quality sesame
article.p3: While promoting sustainable agricultural practices and improving the quality of life of the communities involved, this alliance not only strengthens the local economy, but also encourages the development of a more fair and responsible food system.
article.p4: Farmers express their enthusiasm for this alliance, which allows them to access a more stable and fair market, thus contributing to food security in the region. With this action, INSEMASA reaffirms its commitment to sustainability and support for local production.
